local_intent: Lower until contact on red_plate, verify contact, release plate, and retreat
assumptions: White plate is held by the gripper from prior Pick
Red plate remains at the detected location
coherence_with_global: Implements the GLOBAL_BT 'place' phase: ensures red_plate visible, approaches/alines, lowers until contact (force threshold 10), opens gripper to release, and retreats to safe height.
